overview.summary: Lead the technical execution of a next-generation Realtor Platform powered by blockchain and AI. Drive technical strategy, manage distributed engineering teams, and deliver a revolutionary property transaction platform featuring tokenized listings, smart contracts, and AI-powered recommendations.
overview.projectScope: Blockchain-powered real estate platform with tokenized property listings, smart contract-driven deals, decentralized MLS capabilities, virtual tours, and AI recommendations

responsibilities: Define and own the technical architecture for the platform (blockchain + web application + integrations)
Lead and mentor a distributed team of frontend, backend, blockchain, and DevOps engineers
Collaborate closely with Product Manager, UX/UI Designer, and stakeholders to align business goals with technical execution
Make key decisions on tech stack, frameworks, and development best practices
Oversee code quality, security, scalability, and performance of the platform
Manage sprint execution, code reviews, and release cycles
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, ensuring delivery against project milestones
Support hiring and onboarding of additional engineers as the team scales
Provide input on budgeting, resourcing, and technical risk management
Ensure blockchain security best practices and smart contract auditing
Drive integration with real estate APIs, MLS systems, and payment processors
Establish monitoring, logging, and DevOps practices for blockchain infrastructure

essential: 5+ years of experience in software engineering
2+ years in a tech lead or engineering management role
Strong expertise in backend and/or blockchain development
Experience leading Agile/Scrum teams in distributed, remote environments
Solid understanding of system architecture, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps practices
Excellent communication, leadership, and decision-making skills
Experience with distributed team management and remote collaboration
Understanding of software development lifecycle and project management
Strong problem-solving and technical troubleshooting abilities
preferred: Experience with blockchain/Web3 projects (smart contracts, Ethereum, Polygon, or similar)
Background in real estate tech, fintech, or PropTech platforms
Hands-on coding ability in Go, Node.js, or Solidity
Familiarity with security best practices in blockchain applications
Prior experience scaling systems handling large data sets and payments
Experience with tokenization and DeFi protocols
Knowledge of real estate industry workflows and MLS systems
Experience with AI/ML integration in production systems
Smart contract development and auditing experience

additionalBenefits: Flexible working hours across global time zones
Access to blockchain conferences and training

values: Innovation in blockchain and real estate
